author: Sherry Corbett
comment: I have had this app for over 24 hours and still have to figure out how to use the presets. I'm not the brightest crayon in the box, but I usually am able to navigate my way around a new app. Not this one, so incredibly difficult.  How about some written instructions?
title: Ridiculously difficult

author: Elizabeth Rosenberry
comment: The interface is a little confusing and I want to be able to make ambient mode look just like the lit up mode. The background in ambient mode goes black and the hand out lines are black also. If this gets changed I'll update and give five stars.

reply.author: Luna-78 Mobile
reply.content: Dear Elizabeth! Unfortunately, we can’t fulfill your wish due to Google requirements. According to Google, watch face MUST put 90% of screen to black in ambient mode. It is all about screen safety and battery life (https://developer.android.com/design/wear/watchfaces.html#DisplayModes). Sorry.

title: Needs more ambient options

author: Eugene Bogorad
comment: Brilliant watchface! Works great out of the box, but you can customize it endlessly, 20 built-in faces, all sorts of customizations, many time zones. Very happy with it.  Yeah, you do need an Android Wear watch, BTW. Mine in the great Moto-360 (v1).

author: Jan Cherniak
comment: Tried it on Moto360, looks really promising! Way to go, guys!

author: Alexey Aristov
comment: well done, definitely worth the money!
